general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Building and electrical permits required. Licensed electrical installer required. Contractors must be licensed through TN Dept of Commerce and Insurance.

interconnection.net_metering_details: TVA region - no traditional net metering. TVA Green Connect or local utility buyback programs may be available.

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: TN Code 66-35-103 protects solar access. HOAs cannot prohibit solar.
special_considerations.historic_districts: Nashville historic overlay districts require additional review.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind loads. Design wind speeds 90-100 mph.
special_considerations.snow_load_requirements: Minimal to moderate. Mountain areas 15-25 psf.

licensing.license_type: Licensed and bonded through TN Dept of Commerce and Insurance. Registered with Metropolitan Codes and Building Safety Administration for Nashville.

notes: TVA territory limits net metering options. Nashville electrical PV permits start at $75. Contractors need state license for jobs over $25,000.
